requirements.text: Rebuild the public home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) with a full 10-section layout in this order: Hero, Trust Strip, Featured Categories, How It Works, Trending Products, Nearest Centers, Vendor CTA, Testimonials, Footer. Use the design system: Royal Gold (#C6A75E) primary, Deep Black (#111111) secondary, Ivory White (#F9F6F1) background, Burgundy (#7A1E2C) accent, Playfair Display headings, Poppins/Inter body, rounded-xl (12px) cards, soft shadows, gold gradient buttons, smooth scroll animations, and elegant fade-in transitions on scroll.

quotes: Color Palette: Primary: Royal Gold (#C6A75E), Secondary: Deep Black (#111111), Background: Ivory White (#F9F6F1), Accent: Burgundy (#7A1E2C)
Headings: Playfair Display (Luxury Feel), Body: Poppins / Inter

Include an integrated search bar with inputs for product name, center filter, and price range filter.
